data.title: Whitgift School
data.meta_description: Home - Independent day school for boys aged 10 - 18, situated in South Croydon. Includes details of fees, scholarships and bursaries.
data.text:
Our vision is to educate bright and talented young men, whatever their background, to become independent learners and thinkers, to achieve beyond what they believed they could, and to leave us ready to give back to the society in which they will be leaders.

Our Vision
